ygData.subject: Re: the wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: I found the most useful spells at level 4 were Shock of Fire and Gate.  Root is OK, but I often find the creatures resist it. Soren
ygData.messageBody:
I found the most useful spells at level 4 were Shock of Fire and
Gate. Root is OK, but I often find the creatures resist it.

Soren
